showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“I remember
{Aeris} a lot.”{PAUSE}“No…not that.{OK}
You haven't remembered.{OK}
You haven't forgotten.{OK}
That's not it…”{PAUSE}“How would you say…
{Aeris} was right
there all along. Right by our side.”{PAUSE}“She was so close, we couldn't see her.
What {Aeris} did…
The words she left behind…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Cloud}
“We don't know about it.”{PAUSE}“What did
{Aeris} know?”{PAUSE}“Why did she face Sephiroth
without running away?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Cloud}
“Oh yeah, Bugenhagen.
I have one more thing I want to ask you.”{PAUSE}“We're carrying around Huge Materia.
This is pretty delicate stuff and we would
like to keep it in a safe place…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // {Barret}
“This ain't no good with just us!
{Cloud}, we gotta
get some others in here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // {Cloud}
“She said she was the only one who
could stop Sephiroth's Meteor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Barret}
“We ain't no Ancients,
if that's what ya mean.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // {Tifa}
“…no good. {Cloud},
let's have the others come.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
“That reminds me…
I was the same.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“That's why we're here…
{Cloud}…
{Cloud} has…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:21}); // {Red XIII}
“nghh…no good. We alone cannot do it.
We need to have the others here.”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:35}); // {Red XIII}
“Is it impossible for us to carry on…
what {Aeris} tried to accomplish?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:42}); // {Red XIII}
“I see…
She returned there once again, correct?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:46}); // {Red XIII}
“It must be the planet.
The planet is calling you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
“Ahh, no good.
{Cloud} you call
the others in here too!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:37}); // {Cid}
“What? Did that girl
go off to that place?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:47}); // {Cid}
“Yeah, hoo boy, the planet calling…alright.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // {Yuffie}
“You expect me to do that?
Let the others do it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Yuffie}
“Me either! I don't get any of this!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // {Cait Sith}
“How about it, {Cloud}?
Shouldn't we have the others come?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Cait Sith}
“Nope. Not a thing.
Naw. Can't come up with a thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // {Vincent}
“I don't know,
{Cloud}.
I think we should have everyone here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // Bugenhagen
“You are using Shinra Materia,
as a weapon?”{PAUSE}“Materia is highly dense spiritual energy.
A shred of the Planet's life.
It should not be used as a weapon.”{PAUSE}“We must stop using it…
or the Planet will be weakened.”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Bugenhagen
“In the {CYAN}Southern Seas{WHITE} I think
there was an island where
the Lifestream is.”{PAUSE}“But even if you find
{Cloud} there…”{PAUSE}“The Lifestream is a mass of
spiritual energy,”{PAUSE}“and one person alone
couldn't stand against
such an incredible spiritual current…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.”{PAUSE}“…no time for humming now.
The Planet is nearing
imminent death.”{PAUSE}“Where is {Cloud}?
Wasn't he with you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // Bugenhagen
“I see…
{Cloud} has…”{PAUSE}“It's true that there are several
places on the planet where
the Lifestream is gathered.”{PAUSE}“But most of those places are
below the surface where
humans cannot reach them.”{PAUSE}“There's only one place
{CYAN}An island in the Southern Sea{WHITE}…
“What did you say?
I haven't left here in years…
No good. I can't remember.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.”{PAUSE}“…no time for humming now.
The Planet is nearing
imminent death.”{PAUSE}“But is this perhaps, what the
Planet wanted? Did the Planet
actually want to end like this?”{PAUSE}“I don't believe so.
Were it not so, you people would still
have much to do.”{PAUSE}“And myself, too.
Come back whenever you are
in need of my knowledge.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Bugenhagen
“Listening to you and Nanaki speak
has made me feel young again.”{PAUSE}“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Might sound a little sarcastic.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “Ho Ho Hoooo. I'm glad
you're back, Nanaki.”{PAUSE}“I hate to trouble you,
but please look after Nanaki.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
You people.”{PAUSE}“Where is Nanaki?
I hope he wasn't a burden.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Bugenhagen
“Nanaki?
His father a coward?”{PAUSE}“So that's it…Nanaki's been
thinking that all this time…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Bugenhagen
“The story of the planets…
and those who lived with them…”{PAUSE}“If you want to know more,
then you must listen to
the words of the elders.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Bugenhagen
“The story of the planets…
and those who lived with them…”{PAUSE}“If you want to know more,
then you must listen to
the words of the elders.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
It looks like you have them all together.
Then let's begin.”{PAUSE}“I'll stand there.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo. That's a machine
only I can use.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
If you ever are in need of my wisdom,
you are always welcome here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Bugenhagen
“What to do? Have you lost your way?
When that happens, we each have to
take a good long look at ourselves.”{PAUSE}“There's always something in the deepest
reaches of our hearts.”{PAUSE}“Something buried,
or something forgotten.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // “Remember it…
Whatever that is, must certainly be
what you are all looking for…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Bugenhagen

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // Bugenhagen
“Hmmm.
Perhaps I'll have you take me there.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // Bugenhagen
“What's so surprising
about that?”{PAUSE}“Even I like to get out from time to time
and see the outside world.
I wonder what did it?
I haven't felt like this in ages.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Then let's go.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // Bugenhagen

dialogStrings: Observatory

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
It looks like you have them all together.
Then let's begin.”{PAUSE}“I'll stand there.”

Bugenhagen
“The story of the planets…
and those who lived with them…”{PAUSE}“If you want to know more,
then you must listen to
the words of the elders.”

Bugenhagen
“Nanaki?
His father a coward?”{PAUSE}“So that's it…Nanaki's been
thinking that all this time…”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
You people.”{PAUSE}“Where is Nanaki?
I hope he wasn't a burden.”

“Ho Ho Hoooo. I'm glad
you're back, Nanaki.”{PAUSE}“I hate to trouble you,
but please look after Nanaki.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo. That's a machine
only I can use.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.”{PAUSE}“…no time for humming now.
The Planet is nearing
imminent death.”{PAUSE}“But is this perhaps, what the
Planet wanted? Did the Planet
actually want to end like this?”{PAUSE}“I don't believe so.
Were it not so, you people would still
have much to do.”{PAUSE}“And myself, too.
Come back whenever you are
in need of my knowledge.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.”{PAUSE}“…no time for humming now.
The Planet is nearing
imminent death.”{PAUSE}“Where is {Cloud}?
Wasn't he with you?”

{Tifa}
“That's why we're here…
{Cloud}…
{Cloud} has…”

Bugenhagen
“I see…
{Cloud} has…”{PAUSE}“It's true that there are several
places on the planet where
the Lifestream is gathered.”{PAUSE}“But most of those places are
below the surface where
humans cannot reach them.”{PAUSE}“There's only one place
{CYAN}An island in the Southern Sea{WHITE}…
“What did you say?
I haven't left here in years…
No good. I can't remember.”

Bugenhagen
“In the {CYAN}Southern Seas{WHITE} I think
there was an island where
the Lifestream is.”{PAUSE}“But even if you find
{Cloud} there…”{PAUSE}“The Lifestream is a mass of
spiritual energy,”{PAUSE}“and one person alone
couldn't stand against
such an incredible spiritual current…”

Bugenhagen
“Listening to you and Nanaki speak
has made me feel young again.”{PAUSE}“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Might sound a little sarcastic.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
If you ever are in need of my wisdom,
you are always welcome here.”

{Cloud}
“Yeah, that's why we came.”

Bugenhagen
“What to do? Have you lost your way?
When that happens, we each have to
take a good long look at ourselves.”{PAUSE}“There's always something in the deepest
reaches of our hearts.”{PAUSE}“Something buried,
or something forgotten.”

“Remember it…
Whatever that is, must certainly be
what you are all looking for…”

{Cloud}
“That's easy enough to say…
But, I can't remember a thing.”

Bugenhagen
“It must be there.
Look harder!”

{Barret}
“This ain't no good with just us!
{Cloud}, we gotta
get some others in here.”

{Tifa}
“…no good. {Cloud},
let's have the others come.”

{Red XIII}
“nghh…no good. We alone cannot do it.
We need to have the others here.”

{Cid}
“Ahh, no good.
{Cloud} you call
the others in here too!”

{Yuffie}
“You expect me to do that?
Let the others do it!”

{Cait Sith}
“How about it, {Cloud}?
Shouldn't we have the others come?”

{Vincent}
“I don't know,
{Cloud}.
I think we should have everyone here.”

Bugenhagen
“Do you see it?
What is it that you are searching for?”

{Cait Sith}
“Nope. Not a thing.
Naw. Can't come up with a thing.”

{Yuffie}
“Me either! I don't get any of this!”

{Cloud}
“I remember
{Aeris} a lot.”{PAUSE}“No…not that.{OK}
You haven't remembered.{OK}
You haven't forgotten.{OK}
That's not it…”{PAUSE}“How would you say…
{Aeris} was right
there all along. Right by our side.”{PAUSE}“She was so close, we couldn't see her.
What {Aeris} did…
The words she left behind…”

{Tifa}
“That reminds me…
I was the same.”

{Red XIII}
“…as was I.”

{Barret}
“Me too…”

{Cloud}
“She said she was the only one who
could stop Sephiroth's Meteor.”

{Tifa}
“But {Aeris}
is gone.”

{Red XIII}
“Is it impossible for us to carry on…
what {Aeris} tried to accomplish?”

{Barret}
“We ain't no Ancients,
if that's what ya mean.”

{Cid}
“What? Did that girl
go off to that place?”

{Cloud}
“That's it!!”

{Cid}
“What's it?”

{Cloud}
“Of course, {Cid}!”

{Cloud}
“We don't know about it.”{PAUSE}“What did
{Aeris} know?”{PAUSE}“Why did she face Sephiroth
without running away?”

{Red XIII}
“I see…
She returned there once again, correct?”

Bugenhagen
“Hmmm.
Perhaps I'll have you take me there.”

{Red XIII}
“You're going too?”

Bugenhagen
“What's so surprising
about that?”{PAUSE}“Even I like to get out from time to time
and see the outside world.
I wonder what did it?
I haven't felt like this in ages.”

{Red XIII}
“It must be the planet.
The planet is calling you!”

{Cid}
“Yeah, hoo boy, the planet calling…alright.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Then let's go.”

{Cloud}
“Oh yeah, Bugenhagen.
I have one more thing I want to ask you.”{PAUSE}“We're carrying around Huge Materia.
This is pretty delicate stuff and we would
like to keep it in a safe place…”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Then we'll put it upstairs.
Now, shall we be on our way?”

Bugenhagen
“I'll teach you how to work the machine.
Watch carefully now.
You just pull here…”

Bugenhagen
“You are using Shinra Materia,
as a weapon?”{PAUSE}“Materia is highly dense spiritual energy.
A shred of the Planet's life.
It should not be used as a weapon.”{PAUSE}“We must stop using it…
or the Planet will be weakened.”
